recipesJson.name: BRDZ Melon Berry Sucker
recipesJson.author: BRDZ
recipesJson.description:
Sweet, tart & juicy gummies.
Impressed at how well melon & cherry play together, been enjoying this one

reviews.text: Awesome! This is a flavor explosion. Very well balanced and tastes just like the name. I did use sour from tpa since I didn't have fa and used fw sweetener instead of Super sweet, still came out amazing. Thanks for sharing.
